description: These text faces are hugging to the left. There is less of these because you can’t use the same hiragana characters for arms since they don’t face this way. Nonetheless, there are still some options for emoticons hugging towards the left. If you find some of the more complex eyes are not showing up on your browser, try switching over to Safari.   ლ(́◉◞౪◟◉‵ლ) ლ(◉◞⊖◟◉｀ლ) ლ(´ ❥ `ლ) ⊂(´･◡･⊂ )∘˚˳° ヾ(‘c_’ヽ,,) ⊂(・▽・⊂) ⊂(・ヮ・⊂) ⊂(・﹏・⊂) ⊂(･ω･*⊂) ⊂(´・ω・｀⊂) ლ(・ヮ・ლ) ლ(・﹏・ლ) ლ(･ω･*ლ)
title: Hugging to the Left
